title: Cyntoia Brown Interview and more
itunes:title: Cyntoia Brown Interview and more
description:
Today on the show we had Cyntoia Brown stop by (woman who, at the age of 16, was convicted of the murder and robbery of Johnny Michael Allen.) where she spoke about meeting her husband while in prison, healing post release and more. Also Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a woman who bit off her boyfriends finger off and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
